sections.summary:
I am a kitchen manager with six years in BOH operations. Demonstrated team leadership with excellent staff management skills.I am also a
Motivated chef with 5+ years experience in fast-paced restaurant kitchens. looking to work for a company were I can put my talent and skill to
good use I am a hands on manager and very well respected amongst my employees or staff members nothing has very been giving to me and i
work very hard to earn every title, or promotion i,ve ever held . I give 110% always focus on my goal to give my every best to all i do. and not
afraid to start from the bottom as a line cook or sous chef and work my way up to the top . with a good respectable company
Hard working food service professional
KITCHEN MANAGER / CATERING AND EVENTS CHEF
